column1: #Text=Korra says : " How are we ever gon na clear away all these vines ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Ugh , I do n't get it .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Why do you want to get rid of them ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't think that the people who used to live here are as excited about it as you are .
#Text=" Korra says : " I got ta go face the press and tell them I still do n't have a way to get rid of the vines .
